author: gcolvin
content:
A new Review draft  of EIP-2315 
https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2315
is ready for discussion on the Magicians forum
https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-2315-simple-subroutines-for-the-evm/3941/105.
It attempts to better explain design decisions, and lay out how guarantees of safety and amenability to static analysis can be provided by deprecating dynamic use of JUMP and JUMPI in the future.  I hope that satisfies most of the eleventh-hour concerns that I was hit with last week.

author: timbeiko
content:
**ACD next Friday, 14:00 UTC**

Note: DST is ending this weekend across a lot of regions, so your local ACD time may change. Double check it ‚è∞ 

**Agenda:**https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/README.md#acd-108-march-19-2021

There's a lot on the agenda, so I think it would be best to split the call this way:

1. Go over the Berlin testnet forks and make sure all the issues have been diagnosed, shared, etc. and decide whether they warrant changing anything about the Berlin rollout. 
2. Go over the few EIPs that are related to EIPs already included in London, specifically, 1559 & the difficulty bomb. 
3. Decide if we want to limit London's scope to things discussed in (2)
4. Discuss all the other proposed EIPs, and whether they should fall into London/Shanghai/no upgrade 

My hunch is we'll probably run out of time, so hopefully we can get through 1-3. To hopefully help make some async progress, here are the "open questions" for the various items in (2):

author: timbeiko
content: 2.1: Disabling refunds. Which approach do we want? EIP-3298  vs. EIP-3300  vs. EIP-3322

author: timbeiko
content: 2.2: After months of discussion in <#798586271445680129>, <@!318272156305981440> will be presenting an EIP he believes would make the miner community happy with 1559, EIP-3368, which proposes to raise the block reward to 3 ETH and lower it down to 1 ETH over 8M blocks. This is a hot topic, so any progress we can make async on it would help not have it take over the entire call. I suggest using the "discussions-to:" link from the EIP: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-3368-block-reward-increase-w-decay-for-next-two-years/5550

author: timbeiko
content: 2.3: `BASE FEE` opcode: there were some concerns raised at the end of the call last time which we didn't have to cover. <@!273808422753796097> tried to address them on Github: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/270

author: timbeiko
content: 2.4: Difficulty bomb pushback: we all agreed to have it in London, but we didn't discuss how long we want to push it back for. Some conversation happening on the GH issue as well: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/256

author: timbeiko
content: Apologies for the wall of text! Hopefully the context helps folks be prepared for the call. If people feel we should move this stuff to a separate channel, happy to consider it üëç
